original_text:
They confronted me in the day of my calamity,
    but the Lord was my support.
korean_text: 그들이 나의 재앙의 날에 내게 이르렀으나 여호와께서 나의 의지가 되셨도다

sentences.original_text: They confronted me in the day of my calamity
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나의 재앙의 날에 나를 대적하였고

sentences.original_text: but the Lord was my support.
